title: Big and Juicy Wagyu Beef Cheeseburger
directions: Grill the wagyu beef patties until medium-rare.
Toast the burger buns lightly.
Assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, onions, cheese, and beef patty.
Add ketchup and mustard as desired.
Serve hot with fries or salad.

title: Fresh Lime Roasted Salmon with Ginger Sauce
directions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Place salmon on a baking sheet and brush with olive oil.
Season with lime juice, grated ginger, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 12-15 minutes or until salmon is flaky.
Serve with steamed vegetables or rice.

title: Strawberry Oatmeal Pancake with Honey Syrup
directions: Mix oatmeal, baking powder, egg, and milk into a batter.
Fold in the chopped strawberries.
Heat a pan with butter and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve with honey syrup drizzled on top.

title: Fresh and Healthy Mixed Mayonnaise Salad
directions: Combine all the vegetables in a large bowl.
Mix mayonnaise and lemon juice to form the dressing.
Toss the salad with the dressing until evenly coated.
Season with salt and pepper and serve chilled.

title: Chicken Meatballs with Cream Cheese
directions: Mix ground chicken, breadcrumbs, egg, and parsley in a bowl.
Season with salt and pepper.
Form into small meatballs and stuff each with cream cheese.
Fry in a skillet until golden brown and cooked through.
Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

title: Fruity Pancake with Orange & Blueberry
directions: Prepare pancake batter with mix, orange juice, and egg.
Fold in blueberries gently.
Heat butter in a skillet and cook pancakes until golden.
Serve with extra blueberries and a drizzle of syrup.

title: The Best Easy One Pot Chicken and Rice
directions: Heat olive oil in a pot and brown chicken thighs.
Remove chicken and sauté onions until soft.
Add rice, chicken broth, and peas, and stir well.
Return chicken to the pot and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with fresh herbs if desired.

title: The Creamiest Creamy Chicken and Bacon Pasta
directions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Fry bacon until crispy and set aside.
Sauté chicken with garlic until cooked through.
Add heavy cream and Parmesan, and simmer until thickened.
Mix in the pasta and top with crispy bacon.
Serve hot with extra Parmesan.
